area_info.name: Ancient Ruins
area_info.description: An ancient subterranean complex beneath the forest, divided into Entrance Hall, Central Chambers, and Deep Vaults.

entrance_hall.name: Entrance Hall
entrance_hall.description: Stone steps descend from the forest into a crumbling hall. Faded mosaics [depict processions] and fractured columns lean in the gloom.
entrance_hall.ambient_sound: Distant drip of water, soft gusts stirring dust

shattered_portico.name: Shattered Portico
shattered_portico.description: Broken lintels and [fallen cornices] litter the floor, framing a view back toward the steps.

vestibule.name: Vestibule
vestibule.description: A small anteroom with [ceremonial hooks] along the wall.

threshold_gate.name: Threshold Gate
threshold_gate.description: A stout archway of fitted stones. Scratches form a crude tally.

watch_alcove.name: Watch Alcove
watch_alcove.description: A narrow lookout with slits gazing onto the hall. Dusty [arrow racks] remain.

antechamber.name: Antechamber
antechamber.description: A narrow chamber with [stone benches] and [faded script] carved into the walls. The air is noticeably colder.
antechamber.ambient_sound: A whispering draft flowing from below

cracked_gallery.name: Cracked Gallery
cracked_gallery.description: Hairline fractures spider across the ceiling. A [crumbled relief] spans the wall.

reliquary.name: Small Reliquary
reliquary.description: A niche with empty reliquary brackets and [wax drippings] hardened on stone.

supply_niche.name: Supply Niche
supply_niche.description: Broken crates and [rotted rope] suggest past expeditions.

mosaic_nook.name: Mosaic Nook
mosaic_nook.description: A small alcove where a [broken mosaic] shows robed figures around a star. Tiles crunch underfoot.

offering_room.name: Offering Room
offering_room.description: A low table bears [scorch marks]. The floor is swept clean.

echo_chamber.name: Echo Chamber
echo_chamber.description: Whispers rebound in unsettling patterns. A [cracked bowl] lies overturned.

inscription_way.name: Inscription Way
inscription_way.description: Lines of chiseled text, mostly illegible, end at a missing slab.

collapsed_ramp.name: Collapsed Ramp
collapsed_ramp.description: A sloped passage choked with rubble. Narrow gaps allow squeezing through if you proceed carefully.

grand_crossing.name: Grand Crossing
grand_crossing.description: A wide intersection where corridors meet from all directions. A [fallen statue] lays broken across one path.

statue_hall.name: Statue Hall
statue_hall.description: A procession of shattered statues lines the hall. One [intact plinth] bears scrape marks pointing east.

gallery_loop_w.name: Gallery Loop (West)
gallery_loop_w.description: An arched gallery looping back on itself. Traces of [torch soot] streak the stone.

gallery_loop_e.name: Gallery Loop (East)
gallery_loop_e.description: A parallel gallery with broken niches. Footprints circle here.

fountain_court.name: Fountain Court
fountain_court.description: A dry fountain dominates a small court. Faint scratches read: 'Rest here, traveler.'

scribe_way.name: Scribe Way
scribe_way.description: Shelves carved into stone hold crumbling [clay tablets]. Drafts carry the scent of old dust.

drain_tunnel.name: Drain Tunnel
drain_tunnel.description: A cramped passage with slick stone and trickling water. A faint breeze suggests other routes ahead.

service_stairs.name: Service Stairs
service_stairs.description: Narrow stairs descend into deeper shadow. The stone is worn by centuries of use.

armory.name: Old Armory
armory.description: Empty racks and [rusted fittings] line the walls.

workshop.name: Workshop
workshop.description: Stone benches and [broken tools] lie abandoned.

training_circle.name: Training Circle
training_circle.description: Scuffed stone testifies to long-drilled forms.

hall_of_chains.name: Hall of Chains
hall_of_chains.description: Hooks and suspended links sway almost imperceptibly.

choir_loft.name: Choir Loft
choir_loft.description: A balcony over unseen space; the acoustics here are uncanny.

cross_ref.name: Cross-Reference Hall
cross_ref.description: Shelving stubs with [index pegs] form a network of references.

kiln.name: Ceramic Kiln
kiln.description: A cold kiln with cracked dome; soot stains the vent.

automata_bay.name: Automata Bay
automata_bay.description: Stone plinths bear [gear scarring]; a place for constructs.

scriptorium.name: Scriptorium
scriptorium.description: Writing desks lie overturned; [inkstones] dry and cracked.

curator_quarters.name: Curator's Quarters
curator_quarters.description: Sparse furnishings and a locked [strongbox stand] remain.

treasury_antechamber.name: Treasury Antechamber
treasury_antechamber.description: A heavy threshold suggests wealth once stored beyond.

archive_gate.name: Archive Gate
archive_gate.description: A reinforced arch with rusted hinges. A [gate sigil] faintly glows when touched.

ancient_library.name: The Crumbling Archive
ancient_library.description: Collapsed shelves and scattered [journal fragments] hint at knowledge lost. The air tastes of old ink.

sealed_vault.name: Sealed Vault
sealed_vault.description: A heavy door marked by a warded sigil. It feels significant.

cistern.name: Cistern
cistern.description: A silent underground reservoir. The water is still. Cool air pools here.

ledge_overlook.name: Ledge Overlook
ledge_overlook.description: A narrow ledge overlooking darkness. Somewhere below, metal clinks softly.

collapsed_maze.name: Collapsed Maze
collapsed_maze.description: A tangle of fallen walls and dead ends. You can navigate with care, but it loops upon itself.

lower_landing.name: Lower Landing
lower_landing.description: A cramped landing where deeper vault corridors begin. The temperature drops noticeably.

vault_corridor_e.name: Vault Corridor (East)
vault_corridor_e.description: A long corridor with sealed doors bearing [glyph seals].

vault_corridor_w.name: Vault Corridor (West)
vault_corridor_w.description: Broken niches and toppled urns line the passage.

lower_stair_well.name: Lower Stair Well
lower_stair_well.description: A tight stair spirals into colder air.

sump_tunnel.name: Sump Tunnel
sump_tunnel.description: Water gathers in shallow pools; footing is treacherous.

obsidian_nexus.name: Obsidian Nexus
obsidian_nexus.description: A junction of glossy black stone reflects the faintest light.

ring_gallery.name: Ring Gallery
ring_gallery.description: A circular passage encircles a sealed core, with [anchor points] at intervals.

crystal_spine.name: Crystal Spine
crystal_spine.description: Shards jut from the floor like vertebrae, humming softly.

pit_crossing.name: Pit Crossing
pit_crossing.description: A narrow span crosses a silent depth. A dropped coin never lands.

oubliette.name: Oubliette
oubliette.description: A shaft with smooth walls; escape relies on the upper platform.

warded_quadrant.name: Warded Quadrant
warded_quadrant.description: A segment of the ring glows with faint protective sigils.

demon_seal.name: Demon Seal
demon_seal.description: A scorched circle and cracked [iron pins] suggest something was bound here.

deep_repository.name: Deep Repository
deep_repository.description: Cold alcoves once stored precious or dangerous items.

sentinel_watch.name: Sentinel Watch
sentinel_watch.description: A vantage point over the vault, with [murder slits] aimed inward.

undercroft.name: Undercroft
undercroft.description: Low pillars create a forest of stone, damp and cold.

black_sluice.name: Black Sluice
black_sluice.description: An oily flow creeps through a carved channel toward the cistern.
